attributes.action: Create a Bank Holiday on the 21st June for the victory of freedom from COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: It will give a time to remember those who lost their lives, who fought for our protection (NHS), those who brought hope (Sir Tom Moore) and our politicians/ medical advisors who helped keep the country going. It will be a moment to be grateful for our freedom that many of us took advantage of and spend time with our loved ones as once this wasn’t allowed.
attributes.background: To create a Bank Holiday to celebrate to heroic efforts of all those involved in gaining freedom against Covid-19. To also acknowledge the sacrifices given by old and young members of society and spend this time with family which was once taken away.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Create a one off Bank Holiday on Monday June 21st 2021.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555205
